Description: Model- MockingBird 7string USA 99'Headstock-Traditional w/ natural wood Neck thru constructionColor- trans-Blue QuiltTop- highly figured - AAA Quilt Maple TopHeadstock Plate- Matching AAA quilted headstock with custom shop "R" logoSigned by Bernie Rico Sr. on the back of the headstock under the lacquerNeck- maple/Shredder profileBody Mahogany/AAA Quilt Maple Top Trans BlueFretboard- EbonyFretboard Radius- 20"Fretboard inlay- 9 Mother of Pearl Diamond inlays 21 fret (2x on the 12th fret)Frets- 25Scale- 7string 26 1/4, for punchy low string and low tuning.Fret-wire- 6100 stainless steelPickup's- 2 Humbuckers seymore duncan 7 string design7string Floyd- original Floyd Rose tremolo/fine tuners and locking nutElectronics- 2 volume 1 tone split neck and bridge, 3way. plus B.C.~Bullet Booster toggle for more boost 3dbNote" sound holes cavity into the body, for acoustic resonance.Hardware color- BlackTuners- Floyd Rose Trem, Grover mini'sString gauge custom heavy for A tuning Serial Number 99433This will include custom, top of the line form to fit case with Logo on case.Packaged by USPS with box and bubble wrap THIS IS A LIMITED EDITION RUN! U.S.A Custom B.C Rich (R)!small nick on the back! One of the last few Guitars made by the Master Craftsman~!Bernie Rico Sr.~Before his passing R.I.P~
